text: Leszek Deptuła-grave in Mielec Leszek Roman Deptuła (25 February 1953 – 10 April 2010) was a Polish veterinarian and politician, member of the Sejm. He was born in Żagań. Deptulas was listed on the flight manifestPrezydenckim Tu-154 leciały najważniejsze osoby w państwie (Polish) of the Tupolev Tu-154 of the 36th Special Aviation Regiment carrying the President of Poland Lech Kaczyński which crashed near Smolensk-North airport near Pechersk near Smolensk, Russia, on 10 April 2010, killing all aboard. On 16 April 2010 Deptulas was decorated posthumously with the Commander's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta. Four days later, he was buried at the municipal cemetery in Mielec. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Żagań Category:Victims of the Smolensk air disaster Category:Polish veterinarians Category:Recipients of the Silver Cross of Merit (Poland) Category:Knights of the Order of Polonia Restituta Category:Commanders of the Order of Polonia Restituta
title: Leszek Deptuła
